title: Print, "Enjoyment in Peace (Taiheiraku), No. 13", ca. 1910
markings: In graphite, lower left: Enjoyment in Peace
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower left: [Japanese characters] / no. 13 / Taiheiraku.
description: A large red iris, inner perianth leaves white with purple tips.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Enjoyment in Peace (Taiheiraku), No. 13", ca. 1910.
ca. 1910. 40.8 x 27.9 cm (16 1/16 in. x 11 in.). Gift of Mary Rutherford Jay. 1948-134-67.
